Level 40
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 40
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 05:57 am:

Stage 40

When you start, you could choose either to attempt this stage at the right or the left part. As usual, if possible, destroy all boxes/or let the octopuses destroy those boxes, hence they will fall to the ground once reproduced, so that they will have no hindrance to you. After that box all the way up. If you are boxing in a straight line, remember to destroy boxes where the octopuses are going to land. And also, jump and create box if an octopus is about to hit and destroy your box when it moves. At the top, box all the way to the finish, remembering to destroy boxes where they land.
